snippet: FITZSIMONS--John J. The Board of Directors of 950 Park Avenue notes with sadness the death of our board president on January 22, 2016. We will miss our leader and good neighbor. Our thoughts are with John's family. 1/3
lead_paragraph: FITZSIMONS--John J. The Board of Directors of 950 Park Avenue notes with sadness the death of our board president on January 22, 2016. We will miss our leader and good neighbor. Our thoughts are with John's family. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FITZSIMONS, JOHN J
